#summary How to add OpenID login support to your web app.

= OpenID Login =

In this guide we will talk about how to use our projects acris-security-openid and acris-security-ui to integrate both classic username/password and OpenID based login, for example through Google or Yahoo, into your Java web application.

For more information about what OpenID is visit http://openid.net.
